  • Steps to Migrate to the Current Zebra SDK Version in your Eclipse Project

    1. Open your Android® project in Package Explorer.
    2. Expand the libs directory of the project.
    3. Drag all the files from your [Install Dir]\android\[build version]\lib directory into the libs directory of your Android® project. If asked if existing SDK libraries should be overwritten with the newer ones, confirm yes. Eclipse should automatically reference the new JAR files in your project.
    4. Certain older versions of the SDK may still have lingering references in your project. To remove the older references, perform the following steps:
      • Open the Package Explorer
      • Right click on your project
      • Select Build Path > Configure Build Path
      • Select the 'libraries' tab
      • Select 'ZSDK_API.jar' and hit the remove button
